text: Kate Middleton and Prince William, both 36, delighted royal fans today, as they released an official photograph of themselves with their three children, Prince George, five, Princess Charlotte, three, and Prince Louis, aged seven months. The family were all pictured grinning as they stood in the countryside, with the Duchess of Cambridge holding her youngest child in her arms. Meanwhile, the older two children stood beside their parents, standing on a horizontal part of a tree. The royals are often admired for their style choices, so where did the family get their outfits from for the latest picture? Why Prince Louis is really wearing tights in new Christmas card photo Kate Middleton The Duchess of Cambridge opted for a pair of blue jeans for the rural - themed photoshoot. While the exact brand is currently unknown, Kate has worn jeans a number of times before.
